column6: "DEAD END" Part 2 of 5 Having tapped into the ancient and demonic evils that corrupt his soul, the Hood has drawn together a band of long-dead villains, all with personal investment in the execution of the Punisher.  Meanwhile, Frank Castle struggles with a ghoulish offer that may hold his final chance for redemption. Parental Advisory ...$2.99
